chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Welcome and introduction to the webinar. Sonia Burke, Customer Service Manager at Amstat, introduces herself and Jessica Simmons, Customer Service Specialist. The webinar format is explained: short sessions focusing on one feature at a time, with Jessica handling questions via chat. Attendees are encouraged to schedule group or individual training sessions if desired.

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Overview of today's topic: maximizing the use of collaboration tools. Discussion covers benefits for individuals and teams. Collaboration tools can be accessed through reports, company views, contact views, dashboard widgets, and the tools bucket. These tools provide easy access to relevant data for individuals or teams. The session will cover where to locate, how to use, and how to manage these tools.

metadata.topic: Introduction to Collaboration Tools and Their Benefits

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Accessing collaboration tools via reports. Demonstration using a CJ2 full fleet report showing all CJ2 aircraft worldwide. Explanation of collaboration tool icons next to each aircraft, including favorites (red star), edit feature (notepad and pencil), attachments (paperclip), notes (dual paper icon), engagement folders, reminders, and exclusion from reports. Icons are grayed out if not used and colored if active. The edit feature allows users to modify aircraft data such as price, with an edit history available for review and reversion to original data if needed.

metadata.topic: Using Collaboration Tools within Aircraft Reports

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Attachments and notes features explained. Attachments allow uploading various file formats to any aircraft, company, or contact record for centralized data storage. Notes can be added to aircraft, brokers, owners, or charter companies, with existing notes highlighted by category. Notes can be edited or deleted as needed. Engagement folders function like digital manila folders to organize documents related to specific topics or projects, accessible and shareable with team members.

metadata.topic: Managing Attachments, Notes, and Engagement Folders

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Reminders and exclusion features. Users can create reminders with notes for future tasks, mark them as completed, or remove them. The exclusion icon allows users to remove specific aircraft from reports, useful for excluding outliers or aircraft outside a user's territory to maintain accurate statistics. This completes the overview of collaboration tools within aircraft reports, highlighting how these features centralize and simplify data management.

metadata.topic: Creating Reminders and Excluding Aircraft from Reports

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Accessing collaboration tools in aircraft view via keyword search. Demonstration of searching a specific tail number to pull up detailed aircraft information. Collaboration tools remain consistent and visible across views, with active icons highlighted. Edited fields, such as price, are marked with an asterisk that displays edit details on hover, including who made changes and when. Users can toggle between viewing original Amstat values and edited values to ensure data accuracy and consistency across team members.

metadata.topic: Collaboration Tools and Edited Values in Aircraft Detail View

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Collaboration tools in company and contact views. Using keyword search to locate a company, users see collaboration tools similar to aircraft view but with variations. Company view includes favorites, notes, engagements, do not contact button (which excludes all contacts for that company), reminders, user-identified fields, print options for reports and notes, and attachments. Contact view includes favorites, notes, engagements, a do not contact button specific to the individual contact, and an option to add contact information directly to email clients like Outlook.

metadata.topic: Utilizing Collaboration Tools in Company and Contact Views

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Using the dashboard to conveniently access collaboration tools. The dashboard can be customized with widgets related to collaboration tools such as saved searches, favorites, reminders, engagement folders, and notes. Saved searches widget consolidates all saved reports, highlighting any filtered collaboration tools. Favorites widget bundles all favorite companies, aircraft, contacts, and market summary reports in one tab, allowing easy removal of favorites. Reminders widget acts as a to-do list with task tracking and completion marking. Engagement folders widget displays all current folders and attached documents. Notes widget lists all current notes added via collaboration tools. Widgets can be resized and rearranged for optimal viewing.

metadata.topic: Dashboard Widgets for Efficient Collaboration Tool Management

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: The tools bucket as a centralized location for all collaboration tool data. The personal data manager within the tools bucket compiles reports on all collaboration activities including edits, shared edits, notes on aircraft, companies, and contacts, engagement folders, and favorites. Users can generate reports such as a full list of favorite aircraft. This feature helps users track and manage all collaboration tool usage in one place for better organization and oversight.

metadata.topic: Managing Collaboration Tool Data via the Tools Bucket

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Sharing collaboration tools within a team. Admins can enable sharing features for users with Amstat licenses, facilitating collaboration among remote or distributed teams. Shared collaboration tools include notes, attachments, edits, and engagement folders. Team members can add notes, reminders, and engagement folders accessible to others, enhancing communication and data consistency across the organization. This feature supports teamwork and remote access to updated information.

metadata.topic: Enabling and Using Collaboration Tool Sharing for Teams

chunks.title: Utilizing Collaboration Tools
chunks.chunk_text: Webinar closing remarks. Jessica confirms no questions in chat. Sonia thanks attendees, mentions the webinar was hosted on Premiere Plus, and offers demos for Connect subscribers interested in additional features. Announcement of the next webinar scheduled for January 8th, 2024, focusing on Amstat buckets, including tool bucket and dashboard features. Encouragement to reach out with any questions and holiday season wishes.

metadata.topic: Webinar Conclusion and Upcoming Session Announcement
